loan.name: Annie
loan.description: I was born and raised in Manhattan, just blocks away from School For The Dogs. I grew up in my parents' workplaces, literally: My father was a freelance artist and my mother ran her own small business out of our home.  I was always drawn to animals, and began a dog walking business when I was just ten years old. I spent my 20s working as a journalist in NYC, but always harbored an interest in training. I eventually went to school to learn how to be a dog trainer. When I met Kate Senisi in 2011, we were both trying to figure out how to turn our passions into careers. Together, we founded School For The Dogs and haven't looked back!
loan.whySpecial: It will help a female entrepreneur expand and serve more clients in a bigger space
loan.trusteeName: NYC Business Solutions Center - Lower Manhattan
